47:           return @children['text-search-parameters'][:value]
48:         end
text_search_parameters=(value)

REQUIRED summary: Specifies the text search parameters for the vocabulary search request. remarks: The text search parameters apply to the culture specifed in the request header by language and country. If the country is absent, items for the language are searched. If language is absent, items for the default culture of the system are searched. value is a HealthVault::WCData::Methods::SearchVocabulary::VocabularySearchParams

[Source]

43:         end

vocabulary_key=(value)

summary: The unique key used to identify the vocabulary to search. remarks: If the vocabulary key is not present to identify a vocabulary, the vocabulary headers are searched. value is a HealthVault::WCData::Vocab::VocabularyKey
